ValidationRule.description: Prevent entry in the Distribution Submitted to CAM field when there is an unresolved Distribution Paperwork Issue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = 'Death Distribution' && NOT(ISBLANK( Distribution_Submitted_to_CAM__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Paperwork_Issue__c))) && ISBLANK( Discrepancy_Resolved_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter date in Distribution Submitted to CAM if there is an outstanding Distribution Paperwork Issue
